CustomField.description: Makes a change record into a description change. This makes the affected items readonly and no record are made.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For changes that do not initiate a new draft of the affected item, and do not expire. Examples are ECRs, CAPAs, Corrective Actions, SCARs, Non-Conformance Reports, Incident Reports, and Audits.
CustomField.label: Is Descriptive Change
